summary: Request to set up a logger for the worker package with support for popular Node.js loggers or custom logger injection, with fallback to console.error.
userImpact: Users can integrate their own logging stack with the SDK instead of being limited to default logging behavior.
proposedFix: Allow injecting a custom logger with fallback to console.error, or use a popular Node.js logger by default.
resolutionDetails: Logger support was implemented for the worker package.
keyQuote: I feel like usually developers have their own logging stack and I'd like to have the option to plug into any logger.
